nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,9 +1,9 @@
 # Since resource configuration has overridden the required scopes to denote that
 # `scope2` is required to invoke `sayHello` resource, the invocation will fail
 # authorization.
-$ curl -k -u generalUser1:password https://localhost:9090/hello/sayHello
+$ curl -k -u alice:password1 https://localhost:9090/hello/sayHello
 Authorization failure
 
-# Since `generalUser2` has `scope2` the invocation will succeeded.
-$ curl -k -u generalUser2:password https://localhost:9090/hello/sayHello
+# Since `bob` has `scope2` the invocation will succeeded.

-# At the command line, navigate to the directory that contains the
-# `.bal` file. Ensure that the `sample-users.toml` file is populated correctly
-# with the user information. If required, user passwords can be encrypted using
-# the `ballerina encrypt` configuration encryption command.
+# At the command line, navigate to the directory that contains the `.bal` file.
+# Ensure that the `sample-users.toml` file is populated correctly with the user
+# information. If required, user passwords can be encrypted using the
+# `ballerina encrypt` configuration encryption command.
 $ echo '["b7a.users"]
-["b7a.users.generalUser1"]
-password="password"
+["b7a.users.alice"]
+password="password1"
 scopes="scope1"
-["b7a.users.generalUser2"]
-password="password"
-scopes="scope2"
-' > sample-users.toml
+["b7a.users.bob"]
+password="password2"
+scopes="scope2,scope3"' > sample-users.toml
 
-# Specify the configuration file name using the `--b7a.config.file=<path to configuration file>` property and run the
-# program using `ballerina run` command.
+# Specify the configuration file name using the
+# `--b7a.config.file=<path to configuration file>` property and run the program
+# using `ballerina run` command.

nodes.bodyText:
You can do the following to get an array of string values of the values in the map:
string[] fields = m.'map((val) => val.toString()).toArray();
We don't generally use a mix of logs and println. See 4 in https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/master/docs/bbe-guidelines/bbe-guidelines.md#general-best-practices
But maybe we can open an issue and fix it later, as it's not a major issue
Created an issue: #21850

Adding @pubudu91 's suggestion.
